title: BUbreakingHeadlines

items.title: WATCH:  Oscars reveal 2026 shortlist
items.description: Ahead of nominations in January, The Academy Awards revealed the list of top movies set to be in the running for the 98th Oscars.

items.title: Jared Isaacman confirmed to be NASA administrator after second nomination
items.description: President Trump withdrew Isaacman's nomination in April, before reissuing​ it again in November.

items.description: Jake and Romy Reiner, the children of renowned Hollywood director Rob Reiner and wife Michele Singer Reiner, are speaking out for the first time.
